narrative.inOrderTo: generate a skeleton project that requires the creation of the basic project structure
narrative.iWantTo: perform various searches, on different search engines

scenario.title: User performs search on various browsers and verifies results

examples.step: Given user opens the <SE> search engine
Then the correct search results are displayed
Given user opens the google search engine
Then the correct search results are displayed
Given user opens the bing search engine
Then the correct search results are displayed
